description: We have a new box of evil implements (thanks, Terrible Toyshop!) and Mistress Hannah Hunt was all too happy to try them out on willing victim Marcelo. The thingie that looks like a little tennis racket with a rubber band looks innocent enough, but judging by Marcelo’s reaction, it hurts like hell! This delights the sadistic Mistress; once she’s made a cluster of marks on Marcelo’s ass, she drags him to the floor and tries out the 3D printed slapper. Marcelo is trying to keep it together, but his body jerks and spasms with every vicious smack. Next, Hannah picks up a super cute pink and yellow CBT device, which screws tight onto Marcelo’s dick. The slapper hurts much more when applied to cock and balls! Finally, Mistress Hannah goes back to the tried and true, and canes Marcelo on his already red and sore body parts. And she’s not done yet! (Part 1 of 2)
title: So Cute! So Painful! (Part 1 of 2)
